name: 3rd Annual CISO Summit
content: EC Council is proud to announce its 3rd Edition CISO Summit scheduled for 14th July 2017 in Mumbai. The summit will address crucial subjects like the national cyber security architecture, investments in cyber security, ensuring a safer use of cloud, securing your IoT infrastructure and skill set scarcity. With Cyber security becoming a global concern, the summit will facilitate dialogue between key government stakeholders and businesses to discuss the ever changing cyber-crime threats.
